item.title: 禽流感病例在牛群中蔓延引发需求担忧
item.description: 奶牛禽流感病例的蔓延令牛市惶恐不安，人们越来越担心禽流感的大范围爆发会影响消费者的需求。【原文：The spread of avian flu cases in dairy cows has rattled cattle markets as concerns grow that a wider outbreak could impact consumer demand.】

item.title: 据说汇丰将探索出售部分德国业务以精简机构
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司正在探讨出售德国的多项业务，包括财富管理、托管和基金管理部门。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is exploring the sale of various business in Germany including its wealth-management, custody and fund administration units, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿曼国家能源公司排除对 OQ 化学公司增资的可能性
item.description: 阿曼国有能源公司已排除了为其子公司 OQ 化学公司注资的可能性，这将危及该公司今年到期的近 10 亿美元贷款的再融资计划。【原文：Oman’s state energy company has ruled out an equity injection for its subsidiary OQ Chemicals, endangering refinancing plans for its nearly $1 billion of loans due this year.】

item.title: 加拿大钴精炼商同意购买刚果矿的供应
item.description: Electra Battery Materials Corp. 同意购买刚果民主共和国生产的钴，为该公司正在加拿大建设的精炼厂提供原料。【原文：Electra Battery Materials Corp. agreed to buy cobalt produced in the Democratic Republic of Congo to feed a refinery the company is building in Canada.】

item.title: 法国电力价格暴跌，需求将进一步下降
item.description: 由于消费量将进一步下降，法国电力价格下滑，而该国的核电机组已从过去几年许多反应堆停运的运行问题中基本恢复过来。【原文：French power prices slumped as consumption is set to drop further and the nation’s nuclear fleet has largely recovered from operational issues that kept many reactors offline in the past few years.】

item.title: 安全公司 UL Solutions Holder 首次公开募股最高筹资 8.12 亿美元
item.description: UL Solutions Inc. 首次公开募股可能会为其唯一股东筹集多达 8.12 亿美元的资金，因为美国首次股票销售市场正蓄势待发。【原文：UL Solutions Inc.’s initial public offering may raise as much as $812 million for its sole shareholder, as the US market for first-time share sales gathers momentum.】

item.title: 贷款投资者押注利率 "以长换高 "赚取回报
item.description: 投资者正将资金投入美国杠杆贷款基金，推动了今年信贷市场的一些最大涨幅，他们押注利率将缓慢下降，垃圾评级的美国公司将承受住借贷成本上升的压力。【原文：Investors are pouring money into US leveraged loan funds, fueling some of the biggest gains in credit markets this year, in a high-conviction bet that rates will be slow to fall and junk-rated corporate America will withstand the pressure of elevated borrowing costs.】

item.title: 全球需求激增，沙特阿美将扩建大型天然气厂
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）正在推进扩建王国东部省法吉利（Fadhili）天然气加工设施的计划，这是该公司开发大量未充分开发的天然气资源战略的一部分。【原文：Saudi Aramco is moving ahead with plans to expand the Fadhili gas processing facility in the kingdom’s Eastern Province as part of its strategy to tap vast and under-developed gas resources.】

item.title: 巴西石油巨头争夺 3R，埃瑙塔提议合并
item.description: 在第二家生产商宣布与 3R Petroleum Oleo e Gas SA 合并计划之后，巴西石油领域的交易正在升温。【原文：The deals scene in Brazil’s oil patch is heating up after a second producer announced plans for a merger with 3R Petroleum Oleo e Gas SA.】

item.description: 自 Covid 大流行初期以来，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. suffered its first year-over-year sales drop since the early days of the Covid pandemic.】

item.title: WeWork 预测破产结束后可节省 80 亿美元租金
item.description: 陷入困境的联合办公公司 WeWork 表示，其亏损的房地产投资组合缩减工作已接近尾声，可能在下月底前脱离法院保护。【原文：Bankrupt coworking company WeWork is nearly finished shrinking its money-losing real estate portfolio and could leave court protection by the end of next month, the troubled firm said.】

item.title: 巴西 Votorantim 公司首席执行官称将在基础设施领域开展新业务
item.description: 据巴西企业集团 Votorantim SA 首席执行官称，该公司最近疯狂购物，在收费公路、医疗保健和可再生能源等领域进行了投资，基础设施和卫生设施是该公司正在关注的潜在交易领域。【原文：After a recent shopping spree that saw Brazilian conglomerate Votorantim SA make investments in toll roads to healthcare and renewable energy, infrastructure and sanitation are areas the firm is watching for potential deals, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 私人信贷是管理 13 万亿美元的保险公司的首选
item.description: 在高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）对全球保险公司的年度调查中，固定收益部门（私人信贷）首次荣登受青睐资产的榜首。【原文：For the first time, a fixed-income sector — private credit — topped the list of favored assets in Goldman Sachs Asset Management’s annual survey of global insurance companies.】

item.title: 尼日利亚银行股上涨，摆脱了严厉的新资本规则的影响
item.description: 尼日利亚贷款机构对中央银行将其资本要求提高 10 倍一笑置之，并表示该行业有足够的时间进行调整。【原文：Nigerian lenders shrugged off a 10-fold increase in capital requirements imposed on them by the central bank and said the industry had plenty of time to adapt.】

item.title: 德意志银行称嘉能可可能考虑转到美国上市
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的分析师预测，Glencore Plc 可能考虑将其主要上市地从伦敦转到纽约，这将是迄今为止从英国交易所退出的最引人注目的交易之一。【原文：Glencore Plc may consider switching its primary listing from London to New York, analysts at Deutsche Bank AG predicted, in what would be one of the most high-profile exits from the UK exchange to date.】

item.title: 惠誉评估正在进行的加沙战争，以色列保留 A+ 评级
item.description: 惠誉评级公司确认以色列的长期主权债务评级为 A+，同时将该国的评级展望下调为负面，对正在进行的加沙战争的影响采取谨慎的评估态度。【原文：Fitch Ratings affirmed Israel’s long-term sovereign debt rating at A+ while downgrading the country’s outlook to negative, taking a cautious approach to assessing the impact of the ongoing war in Gaza.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将把能源价格提高近两倍，保留对穷人的补贴
item.description: 尼日利亚总统府知情人士称，尼日利亚计划在几周内将能源价格提高近两倍，以吸引新的投资，并削减约 23 亿美元的电价上限开支。【原文：Nigeria plans to almost triple energy prices within weeks, people in the presidency with knowledge of the matter said, in a bid to attract new investment and slash about $2.3 billion spent to cap tariffs.】

item.title: 土耳其亿万富翁与 QIA 在伊斯坦布尔购物中心交易中获利 5 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卡塔尔投资局和土耳其亿万富翁费里特-萨亨克（Ferit Sahenk）的 Dogus Holding AS 公司以约 5 亿美元的价格将其在伊斯坦布尔一家高端购物中心的少数股权出售给了当地一家房地产开发商。【原文：Qatar Investment Authority and Turkish billionaire Ferit Sahenk’s Dogus Holding AS sold their minority stake in a high-end Istanbul shopping mall to a local property developer for about $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: "廉价 "股票飙升，迪斯尼投资者将目光投向董事会之争之外
item.description: 由于华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.）看来将结束有关其董事会组成的摊牌，多头使该公司股价飙升。【原文：As Walt Disney Co. looks set to conclude a showdown over the composition of its board, bulls have sent the stock soaring.】

item.title: 财务困境加剧，碧桂园销售下滑加剧
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co., Ltd.）上个月的房屋销售量比去年同期大幅下滑，使这家已经面临清盘申请并错过了发布年度业绩截止日期的中国开发商雪上加霜。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s home sales tumbled last month from a year earlier, extending woes for the Chinese developer that’s already facing a wind-up petition and missed a deadline for releasing annual results.】

item.title: 世界银行将批准为肯尼亚提供 12 亿美元预算资金
item.description: 世界银行准备在 4 月底之前批准向肯尼亚提供 12 亿美元的预算融资，为这个希望减少对商业债务依赖的东非国家释放关键融资。【原文：The World Bank is poised to approve $1.2 billion of budget financing to Kenya before the end of April, unlocking key financing for the East African nation that wants to cut its reliance on commercial debt.】

item.title: 欧洲央行准备 6 月降息，德国通胀进一步放缓
item.description: 德国 3 月份通胀率连续第三个月下降，支持了欧洲中央银行将于 6 月份开始降息的预期。【原文：German inflation eased for a third month in March, supporting expectations that the European Central Bank will start lowering interest rates in June.】

item.title: SLB 以全股票交易收购油田服务公司 ChampionX
item.description: SLB 同意以全股票交易的方式收购油田服务提供商 ChampionX，此举将增加 SLB 的技术组合。【原文：SLB agreed to acquire oilfield service provider ChampionX in an all-stock deal, a move that will add to SLB’s technology portfolio.】

item.title: 象牙海岸可可种植者赢得提价，期货价格飙升
item.description: 在期货价格飙升至每吨超过 10,000 美元后，象牙海岸响应涨价呼声，同意向可可种植者支付更多的可可豆。【原文：Ivory Coast agreed to pay cocoa farmers more for their beans, heeding calls for a price hike after futures surged to more than $10,000 a ton.】

item.title: 如果美联储推迟减息，美银预计日元将跌至 160 美元兑 1 美元
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，除非美联储今年降息，否则日元汇率可能会下滑，达到 1 美元兑 160 日元。【原文：The yen could slide to hit 160 per dollar unless the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates this year, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）会议至关重要，大型石油公司正在击败大型科技公司
item.description: 大型科技公司可能是股市的驱动力，但在经历了第一季度的井喷之后，大型石油公司也想说句话。【原文：Big tech may be driving the stock market, but after a blow-out first quarter, big oil would like a word.】
